item.description:
Getting parents and kids together again, but this time to climb at MetroRock Gym. Parents can belay for each other in between belaying for the kids and climbing with them in the bouldering area.

We're scheduling this late enough to let the kids get back from soccer, lacrosse or whatever activity that is going on earlier. Please come join me and my son for some fun.  

For more information about MetroRock Gym, please see http://metrorock.com/

Passes:

Adult: $18

Student: $15

Gear Package: Harness, Shoes & Belay Device: $10

 

What else are you going to do on a rainy Saturday night with the kids, watch a movie?

 

See you soon,

Douglas
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the picnic benches or in the bouldering area.
item.name: Climbing with Kids (6pm Saturday May 21) - MetroRock
